title: HANDMADE
body: Hi guys ! I'm just going to post this here , because I think it's a creation . So my girlfriend knows that I like League and she wanted to gift me something really especial , she put a lot of hard work and love to it . So I would like to share it with the community and know your thoughts .{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}  http://imgur.com/M6TSBRW

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Yahliz,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=yWeyEIAK,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-08-25T08:24:05.905+0000)
>
> Marry her.

Only been with her for 4 months but the relationship its going really well though there is a long journey :) Thanks for the comment ^^
Nicely done, to bad it is teemo. Such wasted artistic talent and time.

> [{quoted}](name=DariusDemiurge,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=yWeyEIAK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-25T08:17:04.361+0000)
>
> Nicely done, to bad it is teemo. Such wasted artistic talent and time.

Your are just jealous :P
It's cute. Is it a handkerchief?

> [{quoted}](name=Sp33d Zer0,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=yWeyEIAK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-25T08:13:04.706+0000)
>
> It's cute. Is it a handkerchief?

Well I don't think she made it with that intention hahaha I'll probably frame it :3
